attributes.action: Do not close Kingswood Drive Bungalows, Kings Norton, B30 3QX
attributes.additional_details: This is a petition for Kingwood Drive Bungalows respite care service for adults with learning disabilities and complex healthcare needs.  We the undersigned, want to see this vitally needed specialist respite service kept open for the so needed support for both service users and the parents/carers, who are already saving the Government millions of pounds annually.
